scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file dist/output.yml --s3-bucket api-lambda-ses-recaptcha-template --profile PersonalAWS
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file dist/output.yml --stack-name api-lambda-ses-recaptcha --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --profile PersonalAWS
scripts.qd: npm run package && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:test: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file dist/output.yml --stack-name api-lambda-ses-recaptcha --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides FromEmail=perez.pratt@gmail.com
scripts.package-sam: sam package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file dist/packaged-sam.yml --s3-bucket api-lambda-ses-recaptcha-template --profile PersonalAWS
